description:
UPDATE: 
* Fixed bug that prevented you from lending items
* Added option to keep search results dialog open when adding new item
* Higher resolution images where available
* Added ability to change the image for existing items when editing
* Improved Migration Assistant


Wooden Rows is your virtual shelving system!

Keep track of all your books, movies, music, & video games!

Easily search for a DVD to watch from your collection. Can't remember which volumes from a book series you own? Look it up!

Wooden Rows lets you add any DVD, Blu-Ray, CD, book, or video game to your library. 

Not only can you keep track of the stuff you own and search for it, but you can also keep track of who you've lent items to and when so you won't forget that Bill still has your copy of season one of "Arrested Development".

Not only that, but all of your data is stored in the cloud, so you can view it online, or sync it between multiple devices! You can even share items on Twitter and Facebook!

NOTE: The app is only a database of physical things you own in real life. It is not a digital music or video catalog, nor is it a way to store or view media on your device.
